website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality athletic sock proven to stand up to a variety of activities.
pros: Users praise the comfort, coolness, softness, and smoothness of these athletic socks
Many felt they offer a good fit and don't slip down
Consumers also liked the multiple colors available
This is a top choice in a lightweight sock
cons: Occasional inconsistencies in sizing and quality
It's important to follow care instructions to prevent sock damage

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try these socks with some other brands I had also purchased. They fit well, and stay in place. They don't provide enough padding for me at least for standing on my feet for 13 hours. Wanted nothing more than to take the socks off at the end of the day. They would be ok for wearing for a short time, or a job with multiple chances to sit down during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K.

customer_reviews.title: Holes after 6 weeks, not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had these socks for six weeks and they already have worn holes. I really like this brand, but these Hidden Comfort socks just do not last anymore. I have probably owned 20 pairs of them and the recent ones have not lasted more than 6-8 weeks. For the amount they charge, they should last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks for Exercise or every day
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. Can you marry socks? They are soft, breathable, comfortable, and fit well. And they don't slide down or cause blisters. You can do anything in these socks with your shoes and they will stay put. I tried these because I wanted socks for exercising-power walking, that kind of thing. Now I wear them any time I wear sneakers. All day. They are nice and dry even in high humidity. Love them!

This pair is just as awesome as all the others I have bought, I highly recommend them as they are worth every penny and then some. I have ran long races in the NC humidity without a problem, and I have hiked in sub-freezing temps in the Rockies happily. Just buy them, you'll be happy you did.

product_meta.title: Balega Hidden Comfort No-Show Running Socks for Men and Women (1 Pair)
product_meta.description: Balega Hidden Comfort No-Show Running Socks for Men and Women offer plush comfort and performance during long races and extended training sessions. Balega’s proprietary Drynamix fabric wicks moisture away from the skin, and specially constructed, reinforced microfiber mesh ventilation panels keep feet dry mile after mile. A hand-linked seamless toe box minimizes friction, preventing chafing on top of the foot. Toe and heel are reinforced for durability. The high heel tab and extra deep heel pocket prevent socks from slipping down into shoes, while the enhanced Elastane provides additional no-slip security. The Balega Hidden Comfort No-Show Running Socks feature high-volume, impact-resistant cushioning, and plush 200 needle-count fabric for race-tested foot protection during extended walks and runs.
